duties_responsibilities.duty: Forecasting and production planning in collaboration with the operations and logistics.
Assist in the development of midterm and long-term strategic plans.
Oversee “WAVE” initiatives to drive implementation and continuously add improvement opportunities.
Lead the execution of new product launches for the NA Animal Nutrition portfolio.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of market trends and competitor activities and assist with strategic and financial plans.
Driving and reporting cost optimization, on-time deliveries, asset utilization, inventory turns, etc.
Regularly produce progress reports, proposals, and executive summaries.
Prepare and present valuable global market statistics by monitoring competitor activity and current market trends.
Collaborate with ADM’s existing animal nutrition global businesses, aligning and coordinating activities among business-line functions, regional marketing, and sales teams.

education_certification.credential: University or college degree in business or equivalent (Master's preferred)
3 years prior experience within an Agribusiness company
